results.title: USA Rare Earth lines up $1.6 billion in US government funds
results.snippet: USA Rare Earth Inc. signed a non-binding agreement with the Commerce Department for $1.6 billion in funding, the latest White House deal to boost production of rare-earth elements on domestic soil.

results.title: Landmark Deal Gives North America Its First Heavy Rare Earth Refinery
results.snippet: REAlloys, which is in the process of merging with Blackboxstocks Inc. (NASDAQ: BLBX), has moved to the front of the rare earth sector with a new agreement that gives it control over the lion's share of North America's upcoming heavy rare earth production.

results.title: Energy Fuels' US-Produced "Heavy" Rare Earth Oxide Successfully Qualified for Use in Permanent Magnets
results.snippet: The Company's 99.9% purity dysprosium oxide produced at its White Mesa Mill in Utah passes initial purity and QA/QC processes of major South Korean permanent magnet manufacturer; terbium and potentially samarium oxide production expected in early 2026.
